body:
Comment 14 by **jeffreydwalter**: 
Thanks for fixing this. I ran the newest version of the code and am now getting this
error:

read ../../../../../Desktop/test.cdr: invalid argument

The code is generating this error when it does the ioutil.ReadFile in the digester
function.
So, slightly different issue, same symptom.

Please let me know if there's a work around, of if you feel this is a genuine bug, I'll
file a new issue.
